scripts.docker: docker compose build && docker compose down && docker compose up
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/public/api && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && cp -r dist/client/* dist/public && cp -r dist/server/* dist/public/api
scripts.build-client: sh ./scripts/validate_client.sh ./client ./server && mkdir -p dist/client && (cd client && npm run build) && cp -r ./client/out/* dist/client
scripts.build-server: sh ./scripts/validate_server.sh ./server && mkdir -p dist/server && cp -r server/* dist/server
